com.ep.ggs.system.threading

Class Parallel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ep.ggs.system.threading.Parallel

  • public class Parallel
extends Object
    This class will help with running Parallel tasks such as Parallel for loops, and parallel programming.
    Author:
    MCForgeTeam

    • Method Detail

      • parallelFor

        public static <E> void parallelFor(Iterable<E> list,
                   Parallel.ParallelRunner<E> method)
        Loop through a Collection of using multiple thread pools. The max number of threads used will equal the amount of available processors defined in Runtime.availableProcessors()
        Parameters:
        list - An Iterable array to loop through.
        method - The Parallel.ParallelRunner to call.

      • parallelFor

        public static <E> void parallelFor(Iterable<E> list,
                   Parallel.ParallelRunner<E> method,
                   int threads)
        Loop through a Collection of using multiple thread pools.
        Parameters:
        list - An Iterable array to loop through.
        method - The Parallel.ParallelRunner to call.
        threads - The max number of threads to use.
